column4: can anyone help me get the 3D acceleration working on my radeon 7500

cedega sucks and there's nothing you can do. There is no other driver

make sure that is not installed, because it will just break the open source driver :)

the free driver isn't great for gaming, particularly not with windows games :/
are there any options i can shove in the xorg to help it?
check that wiki page that Cpudan80 linked to
